'''''Other Minds'' 17''' is the seventeenth issue of ''[[Other Minds]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'' and other role playing games set in Middle-earth, published in July 2017.

==Contents==
* "Editorial"
** By [[Thomas Morwinsky]]
* "The Road Goes Ever On"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Inside Information"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Middle-earth in miniature III: Terrors of the Old Days"
** By José Enrique Vacas de la Rosa
* "Review: The Darkening of Mirkwood"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "Review: Rivendell"
** By José Enrique Vacas de la Rosa
* "Review: Ruins of the North"
** By Thomas Morwinsky
* "First Seed of a Great Forest"
** By: Olaf "Falenthal" Anguera
* "Darkness over Amon Nyrn"
** By: Paul Kirk
* "The Leofrings"
** By: Paul Kirk
* "The Horse and the Rider"
** By: Paul Kirk
* "Urbanisation of Gondor and Rohan"
** By: Thomas Morwinsky
* "Creatures of Middle-earth: Were-worms"
** By: José Enrique Vacas de la Rosa
* "Appendix" (maps relating to the Urbanisation of Gondor and Rohan)
** By: Thomas Morwinsky
